text: Ware ga izen anata ni mukatte,`anata no omo wa hontoni ningen o torikakoma reru.' To itta toki o omoi nasai. Ware ga anata ni miseta mono wa, hitobito ni taisuru hitotsu no kokoromi ni suginakatta. Mata kuruan no naka de norowareta ano ki mo (sodearu). Ware wa osore (ya keikoku) o ataeru nodaga, kare-ra wa tada daigyaku o masu bakaridearu
